name: Psychic Dancer
description:
The entry for my first ever Game Jam: The WOWIE! Game Jam 3.0 hosted by Jonas Tyroller. https://itch.io/jam/wowie-jam-3

As the theme is "Failure is Progress" I originally envisioned a very different game from this one, but eventually settled on a looser definition of the theme where the failure to follow the game's own instructions is what helps you progress.

In this rhythm game the psychic protagonist, Tora, can see which moves her opponent is about to make, but as the player you must steer Tora in the opposite direction to what you're being shown. Failure to trust your eyes is a good thing this time.

This game only consists of a single music track's worth of gameplay, but can you keep all ten of Tora's crystal balls safe?
